Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the SoHo business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of the Soho business improvement district.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Communication from the Office of Management & Budget - Transfer City funds between various agencies in Fiscal Year 2014 to implement changes to the City's expense budget, pursuant to Section 107(b) of the New York City Charter. (MN-1)
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Approving the Modification of units of appropriation and the transfer of city funds between agencies proposed by the mayor (MN-1).

Items.Title: Resolution approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget.

Items.Title: Resolution of the Council of the City of New York adopting the provisions of the “New York city Hurricane Sandy filing fee exemption and reimbursement act” to authorize exemptions and refunds for filing fees related to Federal Small Business Administration Disaster Loans given for Hurricane Sandy relief pursuant to Chapter 380 of the laws of New York of 2013.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: NYC Hurricane Sandy filing fee exemption and reimbursement act.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the SoHo business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Establishment of the Soho business improvement district.

Items.Title: Communication from the Office of Management & Budget - Transfer City funds between various agencies in Fiscal Year 2014 to implement changes to the City's expense budget, pursuant to Section 107(b) of the New York City Charter. (MN-1)
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Communication be P-C Item Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Approving the Modification of units of appropriation and the transfer of city funds between agencies proposed by the mayor (MN-1).

Items.Title: Resolution approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget.

Items.Title: Resolution of the Council of the City of New York adopting the provisions of the “New York city Hurricane Sandy filing fee exemption and reimbursement act” to authorize exemptions and refunds for filing fees related to Federal Small Business Administration Disaster Loans given for Hurricane Sandy relief pursuant to Chapter 380 of the laws of New York of 2013.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
